title: Introducing the all-new Echo Dot
description: Echo Dot, now only $49.99, is a hands-free, voice-controlled device that uses the same far-field voice recognition as Amazon Echo. Through its built in speaker or by connecting to your own speakers via bluetooth or wired connection, Dot uses the Alexa Voice Service to play music, provide information, news, sports scores, weather, and more—instantly. #JustAsk

asset.author: amazon
